name: easeful
content:
easeful adjective
(COMFORTABLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
producing a state in which someone feels comfortable and peaceful: You can travel around the city in easeful comfort. It was easeful music, and it was difficult not to enjoy it.
More examplesFewer examplesThey slipped into an easeful retirement.She lives a life of easeful wealth.The farmers live in an easeful sub-tropical climate.
